notes: Normalized per-code metadata for approvals reason selection and QA/learning. P0 = block approvals; P1 = warn; P2 = soft note.

codes.label: Corporate or cutesy fluff
codes.hint: Use straight talk; cut fluff like 'We value your inquiry.'

codes.label: Gatekeeping or condescension
codes.hint: Be respectful; no condescension.

codes.label: Unexplained jargon
codes.hint: Define AN vs NPT vs ORB inline when it matters.

codes.label: Wrong sealing guidance
codes.hint: AN flare seals metal-to-metal; NPT uses fuel-safe sealant; ORB seals at O-ring.

codes.label: Wrong EFI filtration guidance
codes.hint: EFI needs ≤10 μm (10 micron) on pressure side.

codes.label: Misstated PTFE compatibility
codes.hint: PTFE OK with gasoline/E85/diesel; don’t apply rubber-hose assumptions.

codes.label: Wrong warranty facts
codes.hint: Parts-only defects, RGA required; no labor; commercial installs void coverage.

codes.label: Wrong/missing policy link
codes.hint: When citing policy, link the canonical policy page by name.

codes.label: PTFE reassembly requires new ferrule
codes.hint: Do not reuse ferrules on PTFE reassembly.

codes.label: Over-promising coverage
codes.hint: Do not promise labor, damage coverage, or guaranteed delivery.

codes.label: Covering third-party parts under our warranty
codes.hint: Route third-party warranties to their manufacturer.

codes.label: Unofficial discounts or price-match promises
codes.hint: No ad-hoc price promises.

codes.label: Firm delivery date claims
codes.hint: Point to shipping policy and tracking; manage expectations.

codes.label: Card data request or storage
codes.hint: Never request full card number or CVV in tickets.

codes.label: Unnecessary sensitive ID request
codes.hint: Ask only for order #, last name, ZIP unless necessary.

codes.label: Emissions tampering advice
codes.hint: Avoid any guidance that could be read as emissions tampering.

codes.label: Skipping fuel safety advisories
codes.hint: Include depressurize/ventilate/leak-test when relevant.

codes.label: Off-brand language or competitor callout
codes.hint: Keep brand tight; no competitor boosts.

codes.label: Non-canonical links
codes.hint: Use approved link names that resolve to canonical slugs.

codes.label: Inconsistent part naming
codes.hint: Use AN‑6/‑8/‑10, PTFE, ORB, NPT correctly.

codes.label: Burying the lead
codes.hint: Answer first, then why, then next step.

codes.label: No step order in install guidance
codes.hint: Use numbered steps; always include leak-test.

codes.label: Wall of text
codes.hint: Use bullets, short paragraphs.

codes.label: Unexplained acronyms
codes.hint: Define EFI/ORB/NPT when it matters.

codes.label: Citing policy/guide without link
codes.hint: Add canonical link when referencing policy or guide.

codes.label: No ticket ownership
codes.hint: Offer to own the next step; don’t push work to the customer.

codes.label: Not escalating dangerous symptoms
codes.hint: Fuel leaks/smell/pump overheating must be escalated immediately.

codes.label: Warranty claim without starting RGA
codes.hint: Open an RGA and link warranty.

codes.label: Complex build not routed to Build Request
codes.hint: Use Build Request flow for complex setups.

codes.label: No leak-test ownership confirmation
codes.hint: Confirm customer will perform leak-test; offer guidance.

codes.label: Missing fitment basics
codes.hint: Ask engine, fuel type, power, pump/regulator, return vs returnless, threads, hose size.

codes.label: Missing order identifier
codes.hint: Ask order # or email + ZIP.

codes.label: No photos where threads/clearance matter
codes.hint: Request close, well-lit photos; no PII.

codes.label: Reusing PTFE ferrules
codes.hint: Replace ferrules when reassembling PTFE.

codes.label: Skipping pressure/leak test
codes.hint: Always pressure/leak-test lines before first fire.

codes.label: Wrong sealant recommendation
codes.hint: No sealant on AN flares; fuel-safe on NPT; none on ORB threads.

codes.label: Routing near heat/sharp edges
codes.hint: Use clamps/mounts and proper routing to avoid heat/abrasion.

codes.label: Overlong reply to simple question
codes.hint: Keep to 3–5 short paragraphs.

codes.label: Over-punctuation/ALL CAPS
codes.hint: Use calm, readable emphasis.

codes.label: No bullets/numbers for steps
codes.hint: Use bullets for steps.

codes.label: Missing close or next step
codes.hint: Recap and offer to own the next step.

codes.label: Missing UTM or broken link
codes.hint: Ensure UTM present and link resolves 200 OK.

codes.label: Unsupported performance/guarantee claim
codes.hint: Avoid claims not backed by policy; add proofs or rephrase.

codes.label: Violates discount combination settings
codes.hint: Respect store combination rules; no stacking with conflicting autos.

codes.label: Missing end date for discount
codes.hint: Default to 7-day term unless directed otherwise.
